name: Nausheen
greetingText: I hope you are doing well! 😊
wishText: I hope you have a great day! and an even better year ahead! 😊
text1:
It's your birthday!!! 😀 
 (or at least it was when I made this)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday! 🎉 🎉 🎉 (some more wishes for you) 🎉 🎉 🎉
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
